CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Account Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( ISPICKVAL( Industry,""),"Industry, ","")&""&IF(ISPICKVAL(Rating,""), "Rating, ","")&""&IF( LEN(BillingCity) = 0, "Complete Address, ","")&""&IF( LEN(Phone) = 0, "Phone, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL(Type,""), "Type",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
